translations: v．装病以逃避工作或责任。
· He malingered to avoid going to school.

sentences.sentence: My plan has malingered, the reason was I falls ill!
sentences.translation: 我的计划泡汤了，原因是我生病了！

sentences.sentence: When the delegates of the Greek states arrived to assess the situation and to compel Odysseus' compliance, he malingered, faking insanity.
sentences.translation: 当希腊城邦的代表到达，评估这个情况，并且逼迫奥德赛同意，他就假装疯狂，逃避责任。
